lead_paragraph: The prime minister of the Kiev government accused Russia on Thursday of attempting to freeze Ukraine in the coming winter by using natural gas as a weapon to subjugate the former Soviet Republic.

headline.main: Exclusive: Ukraine Prime Minister Says Russians 'Want Us to Freeze'
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Ukraine Prime Minister Says Russians 'Want Us to Freeze'

snippet: The prime minister of the Kiev government accused Russia on Thursday of attempting to freeze Ukraine in the coming winter by using natural gas as a weapon to subjugate the former Soviet Republic....
